verses.verse: And the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> <S%H1696>spake<s%> unto <S%H4872>Moses<s%>, <S%H559>saying<s%>,

If a <S%H5315>soul<s%> <S%H2398>sin<s%>, and <S%H4603>commit<s%> a <S%H4604>trespass<s%> against the <S%H3068>LORD<s%>, and <S%H3584>lie<s%> unto his <S%H5997>neighbour<s%> in that which was <S%H6487>delivered<s%> him to keep, or in <S%H8667%H3027>fellowship<s%>, or in a thing taken away by <S%H1498>violence<s%>, or hath <S%H6231>deceived<s%> his <S%H5997>neighbour<s%>;

Or have <S%H4672>found<s%> that which was <S%H9>lost<s%>, and <S%H3584>lieth<s%> concerning it, and <S%H7650>sweareth<s%> <S%H8267>falsely<s%>; in <S%H259>any<s%> of all these that a <S%H120>man<s%> <S%H6213>doeth<s%>, <S%H2398>sinning<s%> <S%H2007>therein<s%>:

Then it shall be, because he hath <S%H2398>sinned<s%>, and is <S%H816>guilty<s%>, that he shall <S%H7725>restore<s%> <S%H1500>that<s%> which he took violently <S%H1497>away<s%>, or the <S%H6233>thing<s%> which he hath deceitfully <S%H6231>gotten<s%>, or that which was <S%H6487%H853>delivered<s%> him to <S%H6485>keep<s%>, or the lost <S%H9>thing<s%> which he <S%H4672>found<s%>,

Or all that about which he hath <S%H7650>sworn<s%> <S%H8267>falsely<s%>; he shall even <S%H7999>restore<s%> it in the <S%H7218>principal<s%>, and shall <S%H3254>add<s%> the fifth <S%H2549>part<s%> <S%H3254>more<s%> thereto, and <S%H5414>give<s%> it unto him to whom it appertaineth, in the <S%H3117>day<s%> of his trespass <S%H819>offering<s%>.

And he shall <S%H935>bring<s%> his trespass <S%H817>offering<s%> unto the <S%H3068>LORD<s%>, a <S%H352>ram<s%> without <S%H8549>blemish<s%> out of the <S%H6629>flock<s%>, with thy <S%H6187>estimation<s%>, for a trespass <S%H817>offering<s%>, unto the <S%H3548>priest<s%>:

And the <S%H3548>priest<s%> shall make an <S%H3722>atonement<s%> for him <S%H6440>before<s%> the <S%H3068>LORD<s%>: and it shall be <S%H5545>forgiven<s%> him for any <S%H259>thing<s%> of all that he hath <S%H6213>done<s%> in <S%H819>trespassing<s%> therein.
¶ And the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> <S%H1696>spake<s%> unto <S%H4872>Moses<s%>, <S%H559>saying<s%>,

<S%H6680>Command<s%> <S%H175>Aaron<s%> and his <S%H1121>sons<s%>, <S%H559>saying<s%>, This is the <S%H8451>law<s%> of the burnt <S%H5930>offering<s%>: It is the burnt <S%H5930>offering<s%>, because of the <S%H4169>burning<s%> upon the <S%H4196>altar<s%> all <S%H3915>night<s%> unto the <S%H1242>morning<s%>, and the <S%H784>fire<s%> of the <S%H4196>altar<s%> shall be <S%H3344>burning<s%> in it.

And the <S%H3548>priest<s%> shall <S%H3847>put<s%> on his <S%H906>linen<s%> <S%H4055>garment<s%>, and his <S%H906>linen<s%> <S%H4370>breeches<s%> shall he <S%H3847>put<s%> upon his <S%H1320>flesh<s%>, and take <S%H7311>up<s%> the <S%H1880>ashes<s%> which the <S%H784>fire<s%> hath <S%H398>consumed<s%> with the burnt <S%H5930>offering<s%> on the <S%H4196>altar<s%>, and he shall <S%H7760>put<s%> them <S%H681>beside<s%> the <S%H4196>altar<s%>.

And he shall put <S%H6584>off<s%> his <S%H899>garments<s%>, and put <S%H3847>on<s%> <S%H312>other<s%> <S%H899>garments<s%>, and carry <S%H3318>forth<s%> the <S%H1880>ashes<s%> <S%H2351>without<s%> the <S%H4264>camp<s%> unto a <S%H2889>clean<s%> <S%H4725>place<s%>.

And the <S%H784>fire<s%> upon the <S%H4196>altar<s%> shall be <S%H3344>burning<s%> in it; it shall not be put <S%H3518>out<s%>: and the <S%H3548>priest<s%> shall <S%H1197>burn<s%> <S%H6086>wood<s%> on it every <S%H1242>morning<s%>, and lay the burnt <S%H5930>offering<s%> in <S%H6186>order<s%> upon it; and he shall <S%H6999>burn<s%> thereon the <S%H2459>fat<s%> of the peace <S%H8002>offerings<s%>.
The <S%H784>fire<s%> shall <S%H8548>ever<s%> be <S%H3344>burning<s%> upon the <S%H4196>altar<s%>; it shall never go <S%H3518>out<s%>.

¶ And this is the <S%H8451>law<s%> of the meat <S%H4503>offering<s%>: the <S%H1121>sons<s%> of <S%H175>Aaron<s%> shall <S%H7126>offer<s%> it <S%H6440>before<s%> the <S%H3068>LORD<s%>, <S%H6440>before<s%> the <S%H4196>altar<s%>.

And he shall <S%H7311>take<s%> of it his <S%H7062>handful<s%>, of the <S%H5560>flour<s%> of the meat <S%H4503>offering<s%>, and of the <S%H8081>oil<s%> thereof, and all the <S%H3828>frankincense<s%> which is upon the meat <S%H4503>offering<s%>, and shall <S%H6999>burn<s%> it upon the <S%H4196>altar<s%> for a <S%H5207>sweet<s%> <S%H7381>savour<s%>, even the <S%H234>memorial<s%> of it, unto the <S%H3068>LORD<s%>.

And the <S%H3498>remainder<s%> thereof shall <S%H175>Aaron<s%> and his <S%H1121>sons<s%> <S%H398>eat<s%>: with unleavened <S%H4682>bread<s%> shall it be <S%H398>eaten<s%> in the <S%H6918>holy<s%> <S%H4725>place<s%>; in the <S%H2691>court<s%> of the <S%H168>tabernacle<s%> of the <S%H4150>congregation<s%> they shall <S%H398>eat<s%> it.

It shall not be <S%H644>baken<s%> with <S%H2557>leaven<s%>. I have <S%H5414>given<s%> it unto them for their <S%H2506>portion<s%> of my offerings made by <S%H801>fire<s%>; it is <S%H6944>most<s%> <S%H6944>holy<s%>, as is the sin <S%H2403>offering<s%>, and as the trespass <S%H817>offering<s%>.

All the <S%H2145>males<s%> among the <S%H1121>children<s%> of <S%H175>Aaron<s%> shall <S%H398>eat<s%> of it. It shall be a <S%H2706>statute<s%> for <S%H5769>ever<s%> in your <S%H1755>generations<s%> concerning the <S%H801>offerings<s%> of the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> made by <S%H801>fire<s%>: every one that <S%H5060>toucheth<s%> them shall be <S%H6942>holy<s%>.
¶ And the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> <S%H1696>spake<s%> unto <S%H4872>Moses<s%>, <S%H559>saying<s%>,

This is the <S%H7133>offering<s%> of <S%H175>Aaron<s%> and of his <S%H1121>sons<s%>, which they shall <S%H7126>offer<s%> unto the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> in the <S%H3117>day<s%> when he is <S%H4886>anointed<s%>; the tenth <S%H6224>part<s%> of an <S%H374>ephah<s%> of fine <S%H5560>flour<s%> for a meat <S%H4503>offering<s%> <S%H8548>perpetual<s%>, <S%H4276>half<s%> of it in the <S%H1242>morning<s%>, and <S%H4276>half<s%> thereof at <S%H6153>night<s%>.

In a <S%H4227>pan<s%> it shall be <S%H6213>made<s%> with <S%H8081>oil<s%>; and when it is <S%H7246>baken<s%>, thou shalt <S%H935>bring<s%> it in: and the <S%H8601>baken<s%> <S%H6595>pieces<s%> of the meat <S%H4503>offering<s%> shalt thou <S%H7126>offer<s%> for a <S%H5207>sweet<s%> <S%H7381>savour<s%> unto the <S%H3068>LORD<s%>.

And the <S%H3548>priest<s%> of his <S%H1121>sons<s%> that is <S%H4899>anointed<s%> in his stead shall <S%H6213>offer<s%> it: it is a <S%H2706>statute<s%> for <S%H5769>ever<s%> unto the <S%H3068>LORD<s%>; it shall be <S%H3632>wholly<s%> <S%H6999>burnt<s%>.
For every meat <S%H4503>offering<s%> for the <S%H3548>priest<s%> shall be wholly <S%H3632>burnt<s%>: it shall not be <S%H398>eaten<s%>.
¶ And the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> <S%H1696>spake<s%> unto <S%H4872>Moses<s%>, <S%H559>saying<s%>,

<S%H1696>Speak<s%> unto <S%H175>Aaron<s%> and to his <S%H1121>sons<s%>, <S%H559>saying<s%>, This is the <S%H8451>law<s%> of the sin <S%H2403>offering<s%>: In the <S%H4725>place<s%> where the burnt <S%H5930>offering<s%> is <S%H7819>killed<s%> shall the sin <S%H2403>offering<s%> be <S%H7819>killed<s%> <S%H6440>before<s%> the <S%H3068>LORD<s%>: it is <S%H6944>most<s%> <S%H6944>holy<s%>.

The <S%H3548>priest<s%> that offereth it for <S%H2398>sin<s%> shall <S%H398>eat<s%> it: in the <S%H6918>holy<s%> <S%H4725>place<s%> shall it be <S%H398>eaten<s%>, in the <S%H2691>court<s%> of the <S%H168>tabernacle<s%> of the <S%H4150>congregation<s%>.

Whatsoever shall <S%H5060>touch<s%> the <S%H1320>flesh<s%> thereof shall be <S%H6942>holy<s%>: and when there is <S%H5137>sprinkled<s%> of the <S%H1818>blood<s%> thereof upon any <S%H899>garment<s%>, thou shalt <S%H3526>wash<s%> that whereon it was <S%H5137>sprinkled<s%> in the <S%H6918>holy<s%> <S%H4725>place<s%>.

But the <S%H2789>earthen<s%> <S%H3627>vessel<s%> wherein it is <S%H1310>sodden<s%> shall be <S%H7665>broken<s%>: and if it be <S%H1310>sodden<s%> in a <S%H5178>brasen<s%> <S%H3627>pot<s%>, it shall be both <S%H4838>scoured<s%>, and <S%H7857>rinsed<s%> in <S%H4325>water<s%>.
All the <S%H2145>males<s%> among the <S%H3548>priests<s%> shall <S%H398>eat<s%> thereof: it is <S%H6944>most<s%> <S%H6944>holy<s%>.

And no sin <S%H2403>offering<s%>, whereof any of the <S%H1818>blood<s%> is <S%H935>brought<s%> into the <S%H168>tabernacle<s%> of the <S%H4150>congregation<s%> to <S%H3722>reconcile<s%> withal in the <S%H6944>holy<s%> place, shall be <S%H398>eaten<s%>: it shall be <S%H8313>burnt<s%> in the <S%H784>fire<s%>.
